description:
AJKI-06 EMBROIDERED TWILL 3 PC

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Self Twill Trouser: Self Twill Shawl: Self Twill Color: Black

Embrace the allure of night with this stunning black ensemble, a canvas of intricate embroidery that tells tales of grandeur. The black shirt, embroidered to perfection, is adorned with a vibrant medley of multicolored threadwork, sequins, and zari, each stitch glimmers like stars scattered across a velvety sky. Paired with a sumptuous emerald green shawl, embroidered with motifs that celebrate the rich tapestry of culture, this ensemble wraps you in a cloak of sophistication and warmth, perfect for winter soir√©es.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front neckline on self twill
Embroidered front with border on self twill
Embroidered back neckline on self twill
Embroidered back with border on self twill
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on self twill
2.5-meter embroidered border for front & back chaak on self twill
2.5-meter embroidered shawl with 4-side border on self twill
1.5-meter wide-width self twill for trouser
